author: Alisha Casement
content:
I came here today with my partner after he insisted I would love it...he was right!

If you are after an authentic Indian canteen style meal then this is your place! I worked for a month in a hospital in India and the restaurant was very similar, however the curries here are much tastier! Food was obtained very quickly by queuing to select your curry. The prices are excellent (Â£6-7 for 3x curries and rice) and i left feeling very full as the portion size was generous! The people serving were very friendly and it's clear they want to make your experience enjoyable!

Will definitely be back!
